item.description:
We had a great turn out and a lot of fun for our very first game night and chose Charades as the next game.  As long as we have a free function room we will meet on Fridays every 3-4 weeks.  As this location has a cafe, please come as early as you can to grab a bite beforehand.  Or we can meet at Harry's afterward when game night ends at 8:30 pm.     

 

If charades is not your thing, join Jacki in a game of Mexican Train Dominoes! Meet in the same room.
item.how_to_find_us: Event room next to children's section
item.name: Game Night - Charades
